title: Link “Contact Me” button to Gmail web compose

requirements.summary: Change the Contact section “Contact Me” button to open a Gmail web compose link addressed to randombookcreator@gmail.com (no mailto) in a new tab with proper rel attributes.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Contact Me” control is rendered as a link (e.g., Button with asChild <a>) that navigates to https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=randombookcreator@gmail.com.
The link opens in a new tab/window and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
No mailto: link is used anywhere for the “Contact Me” action.
The visible label remains “Contact Me” (English) and existing styling/spacing of the button remains consistent with the current design.

file_operations.description: In the Contact section, replace the current non-link <Button> with the shadcn-ui Button rendered as a link via asChild wrapping an <a> pointing to https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=randombookcreator@gmail.com, using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Keep the existing Button size and className to preserve styling/spacing, and keep the visible label as “Contact Me”. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
